body:
You don't have to explicitly declare the constructor if it should have **no args** and **empty body**. It will be provided by the Java language.
 
Quote from [Java language reference](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se7/html/jls-8.html#jls-8.8.9):
>If a class contains no constructor declarations, then a default constructor with no formal parameters and no throws clause is implicitly declared.
